titleStmt.title: The fair maid of the vvest. Or, A girle worth gold. The first part. As it was lately acted before the King and Queen, with approved liking. By the Queens Majesties Comedians. Written by T.H.
Fair maid of the west
titleStmt.author: Heywood, Thomas, d. 1641.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by Miles Flesher] for Richard Royston, and are to be sold at his shop in Ivie Lane,

notesStmt.note: The second part, unpaginated, has separate dated title page and register.
The first leaf of each part is blank.
Running title reads: The faire maid of the west: or, a girle worth gold.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
